issues.title: NullPointerException in UserService
issues.body: We are encountering a NullPointerException in the UserService class when attempting to fetch user details. The stack trace points to line 45 in UserService.java. It seems like the user object is not being properly initialized before being accessed. This issue is causing the application to crash intermittently.
comments: I noticed this too, especially when the user ID is null.
Could this be related to the recent changes in the UserRepository?

issues.title: UserService fetchUserDetails() method throws NullPointerException
issues.body: The fetchUserDetails() method in UserService is throwing a NullPointerException. This happens when the user ID passed to the method is null. We need to add a null check before accessing the user object. The stack trace shows the error occurring at line 45.
comments: We should add a null check to prevent this.
This might be affecting other parts of the application as well.

issues.title: Crash in UserService due to NullPointerException
issues.body: Our application is crashing due to a NullPointerException in the UserService class. The error occurs at line 45 in the fetchUserDetails() method. It seems like the user object is null, which is causing the exception. We need to investigate why the user object is not being initialized properly.
comments: This is a critical issue that needs immediate attention.
We should also check if other methods are affected.

issues.title: NullPointerException in fetchUserDetails() method
issues.body: The fetchUserDetails() method in UserService is causing a NullPointerException. The stack trace points to line 45, where the user object is being accessed without a null check. This issue is causing the application to crash, especially when the user ID is null.
comments: Adding a null check should fix this issue.
We should also add unit tests to cover this scenario.

issues.title: Application crash due to NullPointerException in UserService
issues.body: Our application is experiencing crashes due to a NullPointerException in the UserService class. The error occurs at line 45 in the fetchUserDetails() method. It appears that the user object is not being properly initialized, leading to the exception. We need to investigate and fix this issue.
comments: This issue is affecting our production environment.
We should prioritize fixing this bug.

issues.title: NullPointerException in UserService.java at line 45
issues.body: There is a NullPointerException occurring in UserService.java at line 45. The fetchUserDetails() method is accessing the user object without checking if it is null. This is causing the application to crash intermittently. We need to add a null check to prevent this issue.
comments: I have seen this error in the logs multiple times.
We should add proper error handling to avoid this.

issues.title: NullPointerException in UserService fetchUserDetails()
issues.body: The fetchUserDetails() method in UserService is throwing a NullPointerException at line 45. It seems like the user object is null, which is causing the exception. We need to add a null check before accessing the user object to prevent this issue.
comments: This issue is causing frequent crashes.
We should add a null check and also log an error message.
